Title: Trolls
Writer: Jonathan Aibel, Glenn Berger, Erica Rivinoja
Actors: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Zooey Deschanel
Plot: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 4 wins & 36 nominations total
